name: Andrélon Special Shampoo Oil en Care
composition: INGREDIЁNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Dimethiconol, Glycol Distearate, Parfum, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Amandelolie), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Arganolie), Cocos Nucifera Oil (Kokosolie), Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil (Marula-olie), Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Sheaboter), Sodium Benzoate, Carbomer, Citric Acid, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Mica, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-6, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 19140, CI 77891.
